name: Kimberly Griggs
what_you_do: Kimberly Griggs is a chiropractor, mindset coach, and abundance mentor.
who_you_serve: High-achieving individuals who want to feel calm, clear, and fully themselves again.
niche: nervous system regulation, embodied mindset shifts, energy alignment, personal power, abundance mentorship
business_focus: Kimberly brings over a decade of experience as a chiropractor and pairs that with powerful nervous system and mindset work to help high-achieving individuals feel calm, clear, and fully themselves again.
service_provided: nervous system regulation, embodied mindset shifts, energy alignment, personal power, abundance mentorship
